text: Exene Cervenka (born Christene Lee Cervenka; February 1, 1956) is an American singer, artist, and poet. She is best known for her work as a singer in the California punk rock band X. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people category:Singers from Chicago Category:Artists from Chicago Category:American poets
title: Exene Cervenka
